extraDescription: Business Process Re-engineering Consultant for the E-Payroll Project Project Management Support for the E-Payroll project. The project is examining the potential of establishing a trusted source of information for government programs through the regular reporting by employers of their employees earning information to the Gov't of Canada.
comments: For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
